doc:
Stephen Kunken https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Kunken 0 Stephen Michael Kunken (born c. 1971) is an American actor, known for his work on t.v. and in film where he created the role of Ari Spyros on Showtime's "Billions" and Commander Putnam in the "Handmaid's Tale" on Hulu, his film work includes work with Martin Scorsese, Steven Speilberg, Woody Allen, Ang Lee, Barry Levinson, and others while in the theater Mr. Kunken is most readily known for his Tony award nomination for playing Andy Fastow in the Broadway play "Enron". Broadway credits include Frost/Nixon, Rock 'n' Roll, and Enron, for which he received a Tony Award nomination for Featured Actor in a Play. Stephen_Michael_Kunken ( born c. 1971 ) is an_American_actor , known for his_work on t.v. and in film where he created the_role of Ari_Spyros on Showtime 's_"_Billions " and Commander_Putnam in the_"_Handmaid 's_Tale " on Hulu , his_film_work includes work with Martin_Scorsese , Steven_Speilberg , Woody_Allen , Ang_Lee , Barry_Levinson , and others while in the_theater Mr._Kunken is_most_readily_known for his_Tony_award_nomination for playing Andy_Fastow in the_Broadway_play_"_Enron_" . Broadway_credits include Frost/Nixon_,_Rock_'n'_Roll , and Enron , for which he received a_Tony_Award_nomination for Featured_Actor in a_Play .
